sections.title: Bug Fixes
items: [#11] Movie/show playtime line break issue — Issued by @SimSalabimse. Fixed layout inconsistencies affecting line breaks in movie/show playtime display.
[#10] Fix squarish purple block issue in intro scene — Issued by @afyef. Resolved visual glitch appearing as a purple fugly square during intro scenes.

sections.title: Enhancements
items: [#9] Add Logout feature by clicking the user icon in home — Issued by @afyef. Added an intuitive logout action accessible via the user icon on the home screen.
Save passphrase in iCloud Keychain — New feature enabling secure storage of user passphrases in iCloud Keychain for quick login.
